select.Get the top 5 rows from the iris table o: SELECT * FROM sqlite_datasource.iris WHERE sepal_length > 5 LIMIT 5

create_model.Create a model called mindsdb.sentiment_:
CREATE MODEL mindsdb.sentiment_classifier
PREDICT sentiment
USING
  engine = 'openai2',
  prompt_template = 'predict the sentiment of the text:{{review}} exactly as either positive or negative or neutral';
